title: Security forces eliminate 22 terrorists in successful Tirah Valley Operation: Mohsin Naqvi
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jan 16 (APP):Federal Interior Minister Mohsin Naqvi has lauded the security forces for their successful intelligence-based operation in the Tirah Valley of Khyber District, which resulted in the elimination of 22 Khariji terrorists.
In a statement, the minister praised the professionalism and bravery of the forces, emphasizing their critical role in ensuring national security. “The security forces once again conducted a timely operation and eliminated 22 Khariji terrorists, achieving a major success,” Naqvi said.
He highlighted the nation’s pride in the security forces’ courage and ability to thwart the nefarious plans of terrorists. “The brave security forces of Pakistan have foiled the evil designs of Khariji terrorists, and their efforts to maintain peace are commendable,” he added.
Naqvi expressed confidence in the ongoing fight against terrorism, asserting that with the support of the people, the complete eradication of such elements is within reach.
The operation in Tirah Valley marks another significant milestone in Pakistan’s continued efforts to combat terrorism and ensure stability in the region.
